column4: when i try to enable effects i got this message: Desktop effects could not be enabled.... wat's wrong
Do you have drivers for your graphics card installed?
OpenGL vendor string: ATI Technologies Inc.
OpenGL renderer string: Radeon X1650 Series
What version of ubuntu are you using?
What is your computer like? Is it a new one or an old one?
a new one with dual core 3ghz, 1go of ram .....;
Hmmm. Well I'm not sure why it wouldn't be working. Did you use the restricted driver management option to install driver, or did you install manually?
i used  the restricted driver management to install
Hmm. I used Envy to install the latest drivers for me, and that worked fine, but again, I've never had any problems with the OSS Drivers. Do you know how well your card is supported?
yes it is... ATI Radeon x1650
Well I'm not sure mate. Try ubuntuforums, you may get help there from people who know about that stuff.
